title: Drawing, "Sideboard", September 30, 1933
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower left: DONALD DESKEY/145 WEST 57TH STREET/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower left: K./9/30/33 L./9/30/33; inscribed in graphite at center right: out; inscribed in red color pencil at upper right: DIN-A3; lower right in graphite: SCALE 1"-1'0"/7503 [circled]; inscribed in red color pencil at lower right: P; dimensions and instructions in graphite
description: Perspective, plan, and elevation drawing for sideboard. Rounded front corners and squared  back corners, four squared, straight, and tapered legs, long horizontal drawer at center with rectangular pull. Top of sideboard in reflective material, (Bakelite?), body in wood, legs in darker material.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sideboard", September 30, 1933.
September 30, 1933. Graphite on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-928.
